book.synopsis: Pregnant and abandoned, Roxeanne Walker de Persand has her rough-edged sister, Isabel, come to Paris to help her when the powerful Persand family pushes for a divorce and control of a valuable Walker family heirloom.
book.dimensions: Height: 8.75 Inches, Length: 6 Inches, Weight: 1.15 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
